library(DT)
library(dplyr)
library(htmltools)
library(knitr)
scoresList <- read.csv("C:/Users/Owner/Desktop/Fieldhouse Analytics/College Baseball/2022 Massey Scores.csv")

**Ratings through `r ratingsDate`**

```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

ratings <- read.csv("C:/Users/Owner/Desktop/Fieldhouse Analytics/College Baseball/2022 Ratings + Miscellaneous Data - NAIA.csv")
ratings$WL <- paste(ratings$Won, ratings$Lost, sep = "-")
ratings$vsTop25 <- paste(ratings$WvsTop25, ratings$LvsTop25, sep = "-")
ratings$vs26to50 <- paste(ratings$Wvs26to50, ratings$Lvs26to50, sep = "-")
ratings$vs51to100 <- paste(ratings$Wvs51to100, ratings$Lvs51to100, sep = "-")
ratings$vs101to200 <- paste(ratings$Wvs101to200, ratings$Lvs101to200, sep = "-")
ratings$Home <- paste(ratings$HomeW, ratings$HomeL, sep = "-")
ratings$Away <- paste(ratings$AwayW, ratings$AwayL, sep = "-")
ratings$Neutral <- paste(ratings$NeutralW, ratings$NeutralL, sep = "-")
ratings <- ratings[,c(1:2,4,5,30,9:10,12:13,31:37)]
sketch = htmltools::withTags(table(
  class = 'display',
  #tableHeader(ratings),
  #tableFooter(ratings),
  thead(
    tr(
      th(colspan = 5, ''), 
      th(colspan = 2, 'Strength of Schedule'),
      th(colspan = 2, 'Stength of Record'),
      th(colspan = 5, 'vs FAC Teams'),
      th(colspan = 3, 'Location')
    ),
    tr(lapply(c("Rank", "Team", "Conf", "FAC", "Rec", "SOS", "Rk","SOR","Rk","1-25","26-50","51-100","101-200", "Home", "Away", "Neutral"), th))
    ))
    )
datatable(ratings, container = sketch, extensions = "FixedColumns", rownames = FALSE, class = "cell-border stripe", options = list(columnDefs = list(list(className = "dt-center", targets = c(0,2:15)), list(orderable = FALSE, targets = c(4,9:15))), pageLength = 196, scrollX = TRUE, scrollY = '700px', fixedColumns = list(leftColumns = 2))) %>% formatRound("CurrentRating", digits = 2) %>% formatRound("ExpWinPct", digits = 3) %>% formatRound("WinsOverExp", digits = 1)
```
